mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.interface_name , t1.interface_no , t1.interface_url , t1.interface_des , t1.interface_code , t1.business_code , t1.interface_send_type , t1.interface_params_type , t1.template_content , t1.validate_state , t1.create_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_time , t1.modify_by , t1.ext1 , t1.ext2 , t1.ext3 , t1.class_name from ext_interface_info t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.id , t1.interface_name , t1.interface_no , t1.interface_url , t1.interface_des , t1.interface_code , t1.business_code , t1.interface_send_type , t1.interface_params_type , t1.template_content , t1.validate_state , t1.create_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_time , t1.modify_by , t1.ext1 , t1.ext2 , t1.ext3 , t1.class_name from ext_interface_info t1 where t1.id = #{id} for update

select t1.id , t1.interface_name , t1.interface_no , t1.interface_url , t1.interface_des , t1.interface_code , t1.business_code , t1.interface_send_type , t1.interface_params_type , t1.template_content , t1.validate_state , t1.class_name from ext_interface_info t1 where t1.validate_state = '1' and t1.interface_no = #{interfaceNo}
mapper.update: update ext_interface_info t1 set t1.interface_name =#{dto.interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.interface_no =#{dto.interfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.interface_url =#{dto.interfaceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.interface_des =#{dto.interfaceDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.interface_code =#{dto.interfaceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.business_code =#{dto.businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.interface_send_type =#{dto.interfaceSendType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.interface_params_type =#{dto.interfaceParamsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.validate_state =#{dto.validateState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_time =systimestamp, t1.modify_by =#{dto.modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.ext1 =#{dto.ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.ext2 =#{dto.ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.ext3 =#{dto.ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.class_name =#{dto.className,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_interface_info t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_interface_info t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
